Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
击杀 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个石英岩兽单位

Warning! Warning! Atmospheric sulfur and phosphor concentrations have reached critical levels.[br/][br/]Several larger bodies of surfaced magma detected. Crossing them may become unavoidable. Chances of success when attempting to do so are … uncertain.
警告！警告！大气硫磷浓度已达到危急水平。[br/][br/]已检测到几处较大陆地岩浆体。可能无法越过岩浆体。越过岩浆体的成功概率为…未知。

Those readings are no surprise to me. Misguided as he may be, L0G3N-1’s move to set up our confrontation in this environment was a strategically sound decision. He has been experimenting with Promethean technology for quite some time now and what better place to put his findings to a final test than on a planet that was ignited with PyrX gas?
有这些读数对我来说一点也不奇怪。L0G3N-1 也许是被误导了，但他选择在这样的环境下对抗我们，在战略上是很明智的。他研究圣火已经有一段时间了，没有比被派尔克斯气体点燃的星球更适合作为最终实验点的了。

If we want to locate and disable L0G3N-1 before the consequences of his foolish actions become irreversible, we will have to study and adapt to this hostile environment ourselves. I suggest we start by taking samples from the local Theta-8 population.
在 L0G3N-1 的一切行为变得无法逆转之前，如果想要定位并阻止他，我们就必须让自己研究和适应这种恶劣环境。我提议我们应先从当地的塞塔-8 型人口身上提取样本。

The Quartzite always seemed to thrive in extreme volcanic conditions, but the subjects we located on this planet appear to be more resilient than any other specimen of their species we have encountered before. Dissecting them should prove most informative.
石英岩兽似乎总能够在严峻火山环境下繁衍生息，但我们在这个星球上发现的样本似乎比我们先前遇到的其他同类更有韧性。解剖它们应该能获得大量信息。
There is an incoming transmission sent from an unidentified location on the planet. The signal is scrambled and locked behind a level 6 Imperial clearance code.
收到来自星球上未识别区域的传讯。信号被打乱并且隐藏在 6 级帝国许可密码下。

Excellent, that must be Claudius Proton and the other First. Reroute the clearance query to my PCM and mirror the signal decryption algorithm to send it back to its source.[br/][br/]There we go. This should be sufficient…
太棒了，一定是克劳迪亚斯·普罗顿和其他初代。将许可问询重导到我的脉冲编码调制器，然后映射信号解密算法，将其发回信号发出处。[br/][br/]好了。这应该够了…

Hello {STR_LeaderFirstName}, it is good to see you again. I trust it your mission on Gardip XX didn’t have the prognosticated success? Unless of course L0G3N-1 is bragging about something he doesn’t possess, in which case however your presence here would have to be purely educational…
你好{STR_LeaderFirstName}，很高兴能再次见到你。我猜你在伽迪普二十号星上的任务并未如期获得成功？除非 L0G3N-1 手中并没有他所吹嘘的东西，不过这样的话你的到来就非常具有教导意义…

The display of your well-trained deductive powers, Claudius, is wasted in a situation as obvious as this one, don’t you think? It could not yet be determined how L0G3N-1 was able to acquire the Neural Plexus before we even reached Gardip XX. However, now that you and the other First are here, all of that is going to be irrelevant.
你不觉得你缜密的推理能力，在这么明朗的情况下有些浪费了吗，克劳迪亚斯？L0G3N-1 是如何在我们抵达伽迪普二十号星前就获得神经丛还无从可知，不过，只要你和其他初代都在这儿，这都无所谓了。

On the contrary, we both know that whatever happens here is going to be most relevant. It appears our little experiment with the Second has gotten slightly out of hands, just like on PRGN-X5. You must admit, the parallels are alarming.
相反，这里发生的一切事情都有所谓。我们对次代做的小实验似乎有些失控了，正如在 PRGN-X5 上那样。你必须承认，相似的事物值得警醒。

Unfortunately, none of the other First could make it in time. Zetrodicus is still occupied processing Sorinus Alpha, and Jule… well, you know how Jule reacts when things get heated. However, I have brought us another guest: Tik Ji’Glux is the foremost expert on Promethean technology in the CORE Alliance.
很遗憾，其他初代都没能及时赶到。泽特罗迪卡斯还在忙着占领索里努斯阿尔法，还有珠儿…嗯，你知道当事情变得棘手时她是什么样的。不过，我带来了另一个客人，蒂克·姬古莱士在核心联盟时期是圣火科技的顶尖专家。

Zetrodicus Stein - a male Assembly character
Sorinus Alpha - Planet name
Jule - female Assembly character
Tik Ji'Glux - female Kir'Ko

That is correct. The Kir’Ko Te’Naq will take great pleasure in incinerating any human foolish enough to stand in the way of CORE. We just regret we couldn’t be here when Emperor Khansu started his own fireworks.
没错，那些敢挡在核心道路上的愚蠢人类，奇尔寇殖民地都会把他们烧成灰烬。我们只是很遗憾没有亲眼见证帝皇坎苏的烟花表演。
Khansu's Pyre is covered in large parts by lava, blocking your way towards L0G3N-1. You need to find a way to get around or traverse this very deadly obstacle.
坎苏火葬堆大部分被岩浆所覆盖，阻挡了你寻找 L0G3N-1 的道路。你可以选择另辟蹊径或是横穿这一致命的障碍。

The mineral based speciemen type Theta-8 are well adjusted to extreme temperatures and electricity. Analyzing their molecular structure may give clues on how to withstand the heat of the lava on Khansu's Pyre.
基于矿物的西塔-8 号标本类型能够很好地适应极端温度和电流。分析他们的分子结构也许能够让我们掌握如何才能经受住坎苏火葬堆上的高温岩浆。

The Theta-8 specimen have been obtained. They still prove to be incompatible for Reassembly, as it had been established during the Chimera Glacialis incident. Dissection and analysis will require special attention.
已获取西塔-8 号样本。这些样本建造于奇美拉冰川事件之中，无法进行改装。解剖和分析需要特殊处理。
Make sure to leave the crystalline cardio-vascular complex undamaged. Its embedded thermal distribution system will be vital for developing our own heatshield prototype.
确保水晶心血管复合体免受损伤，因其内在的热量分配系统对我们开发隔热护罩原型至关重要。
开发隔热护罩原型任务
Use the data obtained while analyzing the Quartzite to develop a Heatshield Prototype that your light troops could use to traverse lava.
分析研究石英岩兽并使用获取的数据开发隔热护罩原型，从而使你的轻型部队穿越岩浆。
便携式西塔-8 号隔热护罩
An extreme thermal protection shield devised from the Quartzite samples collected on Khansu's Pyre.
隔热性能极佳的护罩，由从坎苏火葬堆上收集的石英岩兽标本设计而成。

The test results of the new prototype are satisfactory. It will be a useful tool for me or one of my operatives. However, any attempts to synthesize the decisive reagents without the need of additional Theta-8 samples have been unsuccessful to this point. We therefore need a more efficient solution to our logistic problem.
新原型的测试结果令人满意，这对我和我的特工来说将会是件有用的工具。然而目前为止，不使用额外的西塔-8 号样本，合成关键试剂的尝试就不能成功。因此我们需要更有效率的方案来解决我们的逻辑问题。

Fortunately, we are not the first ones to be in this situation: After the planet was burned by Khansu and flooded with lava, an extensive teleporter system was installed to reconnect the newly-formed continents. If we scan for the teleporter’s energy signatures, we can identify those key strategical positions and adjust our movements to their spanned transportation network.
幸运的是，我们并不是第一个遇到这种情况的人：当星球被坎苏焚毁并布满了岩浆之后，星球上安装了广泛的传送系统来重新连接各个新形成的大陆。扫描传送器的能量特征，找到这些关键的战略地点，然后根据广泛的运输网络来调整我们的行动方案。
Use the energy signature specifications of the Teleporter Stations on Khansu's Pyre to scan and map the locations of all functional teleporters.
利用坎苏火葬堆上的传送站能量特征规格扫描并绘制出所有正常运转的传送器位置地图。
An implementation of the scanner specifications to map the teleporter system on Khansu's Pyre.
利用扫描器规格来绘制坎苏火葬堆的传送器系统。

We have registered the coordinates of all operational teleporters on the planet. Though we still need to act with caution when we send troops through those gateways, as enemies may block an immediate return.
我们已经标记出了星球上所有可用的传送器坐标。不过我们在派遣部队穿过传送门时仍需小心行事，敌人可能会立刻阻断我们的回路。
L0G3N-1 has betrayed the First and disobeyed the will of CORE. He must be stopped at all cost!
L0G3N-1 背叛了初代半机械人并拒绝服从核心的意志。必须不惜一切代价阻止他！
You have come to Khansu's Pyre to stop L0G3N-1. However you haven't been able to find out yet where he has established his Command Center.
为了阻止 L0G3N-1，你来到了坎苏火葬堆，但尚未找到他指挥中心的位置。
With L0G3N-1 out of the way the rebellion of the Second should come to an end. Therefore it is of the highest priority that you defeat him.
失去了 L0G3N-1 的次代反抗军将会土崩瓦解，因此击败他是你的首要任务。
The Neural Plexus is required by the Assembly to link themselves to CORE. After it was stolen by L0G3N-1 it is now undoubtedly hidden somewhere within his Command Center.
神经丛是半机械人与核心相互连接的必要之物。L0G3N-1 偷走了神经丛后肯定会把它藏在指挥中心的某个地方。
What do we have here? Another First? Have you answered the call of L0G3N-1 like the rest of us?
看看谁来了？另一个初代？你也像我们一样是响应 L0G3N-1 的号召而来的么？
Shut up, stupid! Haven’t you heard about this one? L0G3N-1 snuck away with the Neural Plexus and now they are having an argument about it. And when there is a conflict within the Assembly…
闭嘴，蠢材！你没听说过这个人么？L0G3N-1 悄悄带走了神经丛，现在他们正对这件事情争论不休。当半机械人内部出现了争执…

… there is only one way it can be settled. Come, sisters! Let us join in in their dispute! Bring the saws and blasters, grapplers and grafters: The Assembly are going to war![br/][br/]Destruction leads to life. Reassembly to evolution. Chaos brings order and death immortality.
…只有一种办法可以解决。来吧，姐妹们！加入他们的纷争！带上锯子和爆能枪，拿上抓钩和移植刀，半机械人要开战了！[br/][br/]毁灭带来新生，改造带来进步，混乱带来秩序，死亡带来永生。

Welcome, Doctor {STR_LeaderName}! I am glad to see you could make it in time. I heard this individual, Eva Montinga, was causing you some trouble and was preoccupied our cause may have suffered a setback on Gardip XX.
欢迎你，{STR_LeaderName}博士！很高兴你能及时赶到。我听说这个名叫夏娃·蒙汀加的人给你添了不少麻烦，我们的计划在伽迪普二十号星球上也许遭受了挫败。

As you can see your concern was unjustified, L0G3N-1. I have dealt with Montinga just as I will deal with you. How could you betray CORE and the First in such a shameful way? Seizing the Neural Plexus for your own megalomaniac program!
如你所见，L0G3N-1，你的担忧是没有必要的。我已经处理掉了蒙汀加，我也会这样对你。你竟然拿走了神经丛去实现你那狂妄自大的计划？你怎能以如此可耻的手段背叛核心和初代半机械人？
Neural Plexus - is a device required to make a link with the CORE

You are overestimating my ego, Doctor. I did what was required for the betterment of the Assembly future. CORE is not the solution we seek. CORE enacts control, whereas the very nature of the Assembly is to defy all control mechanisms that are limiting the other humanoid species.
你高估了我的自我价值感，博士。我这么做只是为了能让半机械人拥有更好的未来。核心并不是我们找寻的解决方案。核心代表着控制，而半机械人的本质是要反抗所有限制其他类人生物的控制机制。

We are the voice of chaos and anarchy, and through Reassembly, we will bring peace to this galaxy. When I activate the Neural Plexus, it will not be to enslave our brothers to the will of a mindless machine, but to stimulate the exchange, destruction and recombination of knowledge and ideas that only the true freedom of the Assembly existence can offer.
我们是混乱和无序的发言人，通过改造，我们将为这个银河带去和平。当我激活神经丛之后，它将不再让我们的弟兄被愚蠢无知的机器所奴役，而是会促进知识和想法之间的交流、毁灭和重组。这一切只有在半机械人获得真正意义上的自由之后才能实现。

Your logic is flawed, L0G3N-1. How can you attempt to compete with the efficiency and knowledge of a super-computer?[br/][br/]It is not too late to surrender the Neural Plexus to me. You know your series has always been my favorite. I would hate to see it destroyed.
你的逻辑存在缺陷，L0G3N-1。你怎么能与一台超级电脑的效率和知识相提并论？[br/][br/]现在把神经丛交给我还不算太晚。你知道我一直以来最器重的就是你们这一代，我不想看到你们被摧毁。

No! My argumentation is valid, and you are aware of that. It is your teachings that brought me to these conclusions, but I see now how the sentimental connections to your pre-Assembly existence are clouding your judgement.
我拒绝！我的论点是有根据的，这一点你很清楚。是你的谆谆教诲让我得出了这些结论，不过现在我明白了，你之前与半机械人的情感连接蒙蔽了你的判断力。

As Second, we owe every aspect of our existence to the First. We admire the work and vision of you, our creators, but now it is time the First acknowledged the maturation of their children. Join me, {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Let us finish what you have started!
我们次代半机械人的存在全都归功于初代。你是我们的缔造者，我们敬重你的成果和远见，但是现在让初代承认他们的孩子已经成熟的时候到了。加入我，{STR_LeaderFirstName}！让我们共同走完这条由你开启的道路！
L0G3N-1 has asked you to join his reformation of the Assembly. It is your choice whether to answer that call or go through with your original mission.
L0G3N-1 邀请你加入他一同改造半机械人。回应他的号召还是坚守原来的任务，由你选择。
Reach an alliance with L0G3N-1 and join him in his cause to reformate the Assembly.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Completing this quest will have consequences!)[/firecol]
与 L0G3N-1 结盟，加入他一同改造半机械人。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：完成此任务将产生相应后果！）[/firecol]
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 与 L0G3N-1 达成的同盟

In order to link the Assembly through the Neural Plexus, L0G3N-1 wants you to get rid of the uninvited non-Assembly players.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Completing this quest will have consequences!)[/firecol]
为了通过神经丛连接半机械人，L0G3N-1 希望你能除掉那些不请自来的非半机械人玩家。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：完成此任务将产生相应后果！）[/firecol]
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 已击败非半机械人玩家
So you managed to evade Montinga and her creations - how fortunate! It would have been a shame if I had to pass up this opportunity to give my Malictors some proper exercise!
看来你躲过了蒙汀加和她的造物，真是幸运！如果我错过了这次让恶毒者锻炼的机会，那将多么可惜啊！

You can start by instructing them to exercise surrender. It has been shown in the past that willing subjects undergoing Reassembly are finding the entire process far less... unpleasant. Give my regards to Montinga when you follow her example and run back to Carminia.
你可以从命令他们练习投降开始。过去的记录显示，自愿参与改造的对象发现整个过程非常…令人愉快。当你像蒙汀加那样跑回凯米尼亚身边时，代我向她问个好。
Carminia - The Empress of the Star Union

Another awoken Paragon snob ready to be plundered by House Abaz. Please relax and stay back while we disburden you of your valuables... Oh wait, it's just another Assembly, how disappointing! Your patched-up constructions are always so difficult to sell - and visually unpleasant too!
又一个被唤醒的完人势利鬼即将被阿巴斯家族洗劫。呆在后面放松吧，我们会把你值钱的东西都挑走…噢，等等，只是另一个半机械人而已，真是扫兴！你们拼凑修补的东西实在太难卖出去了，而且看起来也很丑！
We do not care about our value for your House or the looting business you perform at the Cryotombs. Stay out of our way and your people will live... for now.
我们不在乎我们对你家族的价值，也不会插手你在冷冻墓室的劫掠行当。只要别挡住我们的道路，你的族人就能存活…至少暂时活着。

Another one of metal and flesh. I heard that your people are not opposed to scientific method. Then you can probably appreciate the presence of another researcher - the Quartzite on this planet are quite an interesting study!
又一个半机械人。我听说你们并不反对科学方法，那么你应该不会讨厌另一名研究者的存在。告诉你，这个星球上的石英岩兽是一项非常有趣的研究！
The present Theta-8 specimen are fascinating indeed. Maybe we can exchange our findings on them at some point in the future.
现在的西塔-8 号标本确实很吸引人，也许以后我们可以交流一下对它们的研究成果。

Your weakness for L0G3N-1 has always been puzzling. To see that it could cause you to abandon your principles is both worrisome and unfortunate. But rest assured, I will personally reconstruct your neural pathways once your brain is ready for Reassembly.
你对 L0G3N-1 的偏爱始终令人费解，为了它你可以放弃你的原则，这一点既令人遗憾又使人忧心。但是请你放心，当你的大脑准备好接受改造后，我会亲自改造你的神经通路。
Salvage the Neural Plexus from L0G3N-1's operation base.
从 L0G3N-1 的运作基地夺回神经丛。
Infused with Thermal Quartzite Crystals. Grants the unit [abilityblue]Lava Walking[/abilityblue]
融合了热能石英岩兽水晶，可赋予装备单位[abilityblue]熔岩行走[/abilityblue]
Victory Condition: The Path of the First

You can win this map by stopping L0G3N-1 and retrieving the Neural Plexus.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Choosing this victory path will have consequences in later missions!)[/firecol][br/][br/]L0G3N-1 defeated: {INT_0}/{INT_1}[br/]Neural Plexus retrieved: {INT_2}/{INT_3}
阻止 L0G3N-1 并取回神经丛来获得此地图胜利。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：选择这条胜利之路将对后续任务产生影响！）[/firecol][br/][br/]击败 L0G3N-1：{INT_0}/{INT_1}[br/]取回神经丛：{INT_2}/{INT_3}
Victory Condition: The Path of the Second

You can win this map by allying with L0G3N-1 and defeating all present non-Assembly players.[br/][br/][firecol](Warning: Choosing this victory path will have consequences in later missions!)[/firecol][br/][br/]Allied with L0G3N-1: {INT_0}/{INT_1}[br/]Non-Assembly Players remaining: {INT_2}/{INT_3}
与 L0G3N-1 结盟并击败所有非半机械人玩家来获得此地图胜利。[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：选择这条胜利之路将对后续任务产生影响！）[/firecol][br/][br/]与 L0G3N-1 结盟：{INT_0}/{INT_1}[br/]剩余非半机械人玩家：{INT_2}/{INT_3}
与 L0G3N-1 结盟：{INT_0}/{INT_1}[br/]已击败非半机械人玩家：{INT_2}/{INT_3}

We have secured the Neural Plexus. Fortunately, L0G3N-1 did not damage it severely enough during his experiments to render it useless. The rebellion of the Second has come to an end, however we will have to analyze their cerebral cortex to be able to avoid transgressions like this in the future.
我们已经获得了神经丛。幸运的是，L0G3N-1 的实验并没有对神经丛造成严重的损害。次代的叛乱已经到头了，但是我们必须对他们的大脑皮层进行分析，才能在未来避免类似的事情发生。

The Reassembly of Khansu’s Pyre is complete. Turning my back on Claudius and the other First wasn’t easy. But in time they will see that it is only the natural continuation of the revolution we started on PRGN-X5.
坎苏火葬堆的改造已经完成。背叛克劳迪亚斯和另一个初代并不容易。但假以时日，他们会发现，这只是我们在 PRGN-X5 上所开启之革命的自然延续。
胜利条件：L0G3N-1 必须存活
To establish the Assembly link independent from CORE, it is indispensable that L0G3N-1 survives on Khansu's Pyre.[br/][br/]L0G3N-1 alive: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
为了建立独立于核心的半机械人连接，L0G3N-1 必须在坎苏火葬堆中存活。[br/][br/]L0G3N-1 存活：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
